sentences.en: At that time every cadet had to be'smuggled " in.
sentences.cn: 每个学员都得“潜越 ” 入境.

sentences.en: He is a West Point cadet now.
sentences.cn: 他现在是西点军校的学生了.

sentences.en: Her boyfriend is a cadet of West Point.
sentences.cn: 她的男朋友是西点军校的一名军校生.

sentences.en: Here comes a space cadet who looks like he has more money than he needs.
sentences.cn: 瞧,来了个傻瓜,装出一副很有钱的样子.

sentences.en: IELTS Class: Available in the cadet's senior year.
sentences.cn: 英国剑桥大学英语认证(IELTS)班: 可于四年级选修.

sentences.en: Is that part of the training here, Cadet, smelling body parts?
sentences.cn: 那是这儿训练的一部分吗, 学员, 闻尸体的部位?
尼古拉斯是海军学校的一名新学员.

sentences.en: Parmi ces trois fr è re, c'est le cadet qui vous ressmble le plus.
sentences.cn: 在这三兄弟中,最小的最像你.

sentences.en: Payment by an Irrevocable letter of cadet be covenant for us.
sentences.cn: 用不可撤销的信用证支付对我们来说很方便.

sentences.en: SPOCK, A CADET AT STARFLEET ACADY, BEGINS SERVING ABOARD THE ENTERPRISE UNDER CAPTAIN PIKE.
sentences.cn: 史巴克, 星舰学院的学员, 开始在PIKE舰长指挥的[企业号]中服役.

sentences.en: The cadets who were hijacked from Razmak Cadet College, they were kidnapped from Jani Khel.
sentences.cn: 那些从拉兹马克学员学院被劫持的学员是在贾尼海勒区被绑架的.

sentences.en: The dream of a space cadet?
sentences.cn: 太空军校学员的梦想 吗 ?

sentences.en: The police cadet's duties were confined to taking statements from women and children.
sentences.cn: 警察学校学生的职责被局限在仅纪录妇女和小孩的陈述.

sentences.en: Vladimar Radmonivic - He is a space cadet no more.
sentences.cn: 拉德马诺维奇 —— 他不再是太空宇航员.
